certifications.name: Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate
certifications.description: Comprehensive 8-course program covering cybersecurity foundations, network security, Linux, SQL, Python automation, incident detection and response, and security operations.

certifications.name: CompTIA Security+
certifications.description: Foundational cybersecurity certification covering network security, compliance, and operational security.

certifications.name: Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
certifications.description: Advanced certification in ethical hacking methodologies and penetration testing techniques.
